resources.string: Parent Feedback
Getting admission in the college for my ward is a matter of pride for me.
The admission process in the college is fair and accurate.
My ward is improving his knowledge through interaction with Faculty of the college.
The discipline in the college is good.
The atmosphere in the college is conducive for learning.
There is a positive change in the behaviour of my ward after joining the college.
I have great respect for KMIT.
Do you rate KMIT as one of the best colleges among the JNTU affiliatedâ€‹ colleges.
The college information is accessible to all.
KMIT website and Sanjaya App is very informative and is regularly updated.
The curriculum of the course is well designed and promotes learning experience of the students.
Employability is given focus in the curriculum design.
The curriculum incorporates recent changes in the area.
Examination results are intimidated timely.
The college Staff are cooperative.
